thread.title: Tiffany Trump brings a friend to New York Fashion Week | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Tiffany Trump brings a friend to New York Fashion Week | Daily Mail Online

author: Darren Boyle For Mailonline
title: Tiffany Trump brings a friend to New York Fashion Week | Daily Mail Online

organizations.name: new york fashion week | daily mail online

text: comments First daughter Tiffany Trump found some friends to bring with her to New York Fashion week after several editors refused to sit beside her during an earlier show. Tiffany, 23, faced the ignominy of having to sit beside an empty seat after several fashion editors refused to sit next to her in an apparent protest against her president father. During Vivienne Tam's Runway Show, Tiffany sat between her Instagram friends Andrew Warren and Reya Benitez. Tiffany Trump, pictured left, was sitting beside her Rich Kid of Instagram friend Reya Benitez, right, at the Vivienne Tam Runway show during New York Fashion Week at Gallery 1 Trump, who was wearing a black dress, center, was also sitting beside her friend Andrew Warren, who appeared to be more interested in his iPhone than the actual show Tiffany Trump, pictured, does not have an official role in her father's administration Earlier in the week, Tiffany Trump was snubbed by a number of fashion editors who refused to sit next to her during Philipp Plein's show, which drew the ire of the celebrated designer One fashion writer spotted the apparent snub and posted photographs online Twitter, unusually, seemed very supportive of someone facing adversity Unlike the earlier Philipp Plein show, where two fashion editors refused to sit beside the first daughter, Tiffany was surrounded on all sides, with even a secret service agent discretely in the background.
